title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.StructureSystemToPatternArray
description: Gets or sets the structure systems to pattern in this linear pattern feature.
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILinearPatternFeatureData::BodyPattern
is true.
Use the setter of this property to change structure systems only after the linear pattern feature has been created.
Before using this property in .NET code, read
IDispatch Object Arrays as Input in .NET
. To remove a structure system from the pattern, set this property to a DispatchWrapper array containing one null element.
For more information, see the
SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help > Weldments and Structure System > Pattern and Mirror Support
topic.
